technologies.name: Sentry
technologies.description: Sentry is an open-source platform for workflow productivity, aggregating errors from across the stack in real time.

technologies.name: Node.js
technologies.description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, JavaScript runtime environment that executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.

technologies.name: SvelteKit
technologies.description: SvelteKit is the official Svelte framework for building web applications with a flexible filesystem-based routing.

technologies.name: Svelte
technologies.description: Svelte is a free and open-source front end compiler created by Rich Harris and maintained by the Svelte core team members.

technologies.name: Google Ads
technologies.description: Google Ads is an online advertising platform developed by Google.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Google Ads Conversion Tracking
technologies.description: Google Ads Conversion Tracking is a free tool that shows you what happens after a customer interacts with your ads.

technologies.name: OVHcloud
technologies.description: OVHcloud is a global, cloud provider delivering hosted private cloud, public cloud, and dedicated server solutions.

technologies.name: Vite
technologies.description: Vite is a rapid development tool for modern web projects.

technologies.name: PWA
technologies.description: Progressive Web Apps (PWAs) are web apps built and enhanced with modern APIs to deliver enhanced capabilities, reliability, and installability while reaching anyone, anywhere, on any device, all with a single codebase.
